Translations.Text: Children of Adam, did I not charge you that you should not serve Satan? Indeed he is your obvious enemy
And that you should (only) serve Me. This is a straight path
And he certainly misguided a great number of you. Did you not use to understand
This is hell that you were promised
Enter (and burn in) it today, because of what you used to disbelieve
We set a seal on (and shut) their mouth today, and their hands speak to Us and their feet testify to what they were doing
And if We want, We would blind their eyes, then they would rush toward the path, but how would they see
And if We want, We would immobilize them in their places, then they could not proceed or return
And whomever We give him long life, We reverse him in the creation (and make him weak), so do they not understand
And We did not teach him the poetry, and it is not appropriate for him. This is only a reminder and a clear (and clarifying) Quran
to warn anyone who is alive and to prove the word (of God) against the disbelievers
Or did they not see that We created livestock for them, by what Our hands (power) did, and they are their owners
And We tamed them for them, and some of them are their rides and they eat some of them
And there are (other) benefits and beverages for them in them, so would they not thank
And they took gods other than God so that they may be helped
They (those gods) cannot help them, while they are present for them as (ready and loyal) troop
So do not be sad by their word. Indeed We know what they hide and what they disclose
Or did not the human being see that We created him from a fertilized egg, and then he is an obvious adversary
And he set out an example for Us, and he forgot his creation, he said: who gives life to the bones when they are decomposed
Say: the One who gave them life creating them the first time, and He knows every (kind of) creation
the One who made fire for you from the green tree, and then you light (fire) from it
Or is the One who created the skies and the earth not able to create similar to them? Yes, and He is the knowledgeable creator
When He wants anything, His order for it is only to say: be, and it will be
So glory to the One that kingdom of everything is in His hand, and you are returned to Him
By those who lined up in rows
and those who drive away (evil or clouds) vigorously
and those reading a reminder
that your god is certainly One
Master of the skies and the earth and what is between them, and Master of the easts
Indeed We beautified the sky of the world with beauty of the stars
and as a guard against every defiant devil
They would not listen to the high assembly, for they are pelted from every side
chased away, and they have an everlasting punishment
Except someone who snatches (and overhears) the snatch (the word), then a piercing shooting flame follows him
So ask their opinion: are they a harder creation or those We created (such as angels and the universe)? Indeed We created them from sticky clay
No, but you wonder while they ridicule
And when they are reminded, they do not take notice
And when they see a sign they ridicule
and they say: this is only an obvious magic
are we raised after when we are dead and turned into dust and bones
or our forefathers
Say: yes, and you are humiliated
It is only a single shout, and then they see
and they say: woe to us, this is the judgment day
This is the day of separation/decision, the one that you used to deny it
